=== Compile Time ===
   * *pcsclite* development package

   * If you want to compile the evolving UI prototypes to see what they look like you will need *Glade* and it's development headers.

=== Link Time ===
  * *libpcsclite* to link executable.

   * If you want to compile the evolving UI prototypes to see what they look like you will need *Glade* and it's libraries.

=== Run Time ===
  * *pcscd* installed and daemon running on local machine.
  * *libccid* driver installed, should be loaded by pcscd.
